lines.text: Hollywood, the city of the cinema at last! Home of fame, fortune, and Lauren Bacall.

[Talking to herself]
So you say I'm mean to you. You say I'm mad, cruel, domineering. Good morning. Well, you're right. I'm all this, and heaven too.

[Daffy enters covered in gold paint]
Say, who are you supposed to be?
Peasant! For your sole information, I am the Academy Oscar, and J.L. is waiting.
It's amazing. Why, you're just what we've been looking for. That profeel. Those looks. What's Errol Flynn got that you haven't got? Don't answer that!
Keep your hands off me! I came here to see the stars, and I ain't leaving until I see them, see?
Well, for goodness sake. Why didn't you say so? I can show you all the stars.
You honest and truly can? Buddy? Pal? Chum?
[Hits Daffy over the head and throws him in a garbage can]

[Sees stars around his head]
Look at all the pretty stars. There's Hedy Lamaar, and Alexis Smith, and Dorothy Lamour, and Baby Schnooks, and... Sufferin' succotash, it's Ann Sheridan!
